abstract: The director of Expert Labs discusses the White House’s using URL shorteners and working with the government to start apps.
snippet: The director of Expert Labs discusses the White House’s using URL shorteners and working with the government to start apps.
lead_paragraph: In this installment of One on One, I sit down with Anil Dash, formerly of Six Apart, which created the popular blogging software Movable Type. Mr. Dash is now the director of Expert Labs, a Government 2.0 initiative that aims to connect United States government projects with citizens who want to become more involved in the political discussion.

headline.main: One on One: Anil Dash of Expert Labs
